file_content.text: Hello again. The droid's been feeding me data for a while; I think this is the real deal.
There's a glitch in the Nar Shaddaa transport system, centuries old; maybe manufactured by its architects.
If you take a public speeder to... these coordinates, it should get you closer to this plasma-sealed jar.
Leaving directions as promised, Arak. That plasma-sealed jar you're hunting is in here somewhere.
If the droid's early data is correct, Nar Shaddaa's architects left a glitch in the transport system, a secret route.
Try taking a public speeder to... these coordinates to trigger the glitch. I've got to get back to work; let me know how it goes.
